Title: Conservation Ontario (CO) Open Data Hub
Author: Conservation Ontario
Abstract:
Data, StoryMaps, and reports from Ontario Conservation Authorities. These include Central Lake Ontario, Halton, Niagara Peninsula, Grand River, Rideau Valley, Lake Simcoe, Toronto and Region, Quinte, Catfish Creek, Credit Valley, and Upper Thames River Conservation Authorities.

The data hub has been organized into the following categories:

  • Aquatics
  • Basemaps and imagery
  • Boundaries
  • Conservation lands
  • Elevation
  • Flood, forecasting & warning
  • Groundwater
  • Hydrology
  • Infrastructure
  • Monitoring and reporting
  • Natural hazards
  • Natural heritage
  • Planning & regulations
  • Source water protection

Additional information and resources are available through the Conservation Ontario website.
Geospatial Subjects: Boundaries||Human Environment||Physical Environment||Planning||Portals||Remote Sensing and Air Photos||Topography||Water Resources
